name: shalour-sable
effect: Cures any major status ailment and confusion.
short_effect: Cures any major status ailment and confusion.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Shalour City’s famous shortbread. It can be used
once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Shalour City’s famous shortbread. It can be used
once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The Kalos region’s famous shortbread. It can be used
to heal all the status conditions of a single Pokémon.

once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.
